title: GRAND SEA VILLASin croatia
description: Four luxury villas in Croatia, part of the prestigious Kempinski Hotel Adriatic resort in Savudrija, offer panoramic Adriatic Sea views and private pools. Each 1,000-square-meter villa, steps from the beach, has been exquisitely renovated with interiors by top brands like Minotti, Poliform, and Dedon.

title: LUXURY VILLAS IN MALLORCA
description: This redevelopment project is transforming three expansive luxury villas in a prestigious, sought-after location. Each villa spans over 1,000 square meters, offering a perfect balance of space and sophistication. Two of the villas are already complete, with the third set for completion in 2027.

title: MOLO LIPNO RESIDENCE
description: Molo Lipno, a luxury destination on Lipno Lake in the Czech Republic, offers 100 lakeside apartments and penthouses with stunning views and easy access to Å umava National Park. The resort features a 120-meter pier, and a 5-star hotel is set to open by 2028. It recently won the "Best Large-Scale Residential Project" at the Best of Realty Awards.
